analyzed: ci'i phyir 'bras bu dang po las yongs su nyams pa med ces bya ba ni mthar gyis pa dang / 'dod chags @202a * //

analyzed: dngos po ji ltar kun brtags pa la dmigs pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i don to //

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /

analyzed: 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i rtsa ba can yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba smos te /

analyzed: mthong bas thos pa re re'o zhes bya ba ni de ni lam gnyi gas brtan por byas pa ma yin pa'i phyir te /
translated: This is because that path is not stabilized by both paths,

original: slob pa'i gnas skabs yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: slob pa'i gnas skabs yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is the stage of a learner.

original: sbyor ba'i lam ni thams cad du gcig kho na yin no zhes bya ba ni mi g-yo ba rtogs par bya ba dang / mthong bas thob par byed pa la'o ;
analyzed: sbyor ba'i lam ni thams cad du gcig kho na yin no zhes bya ba ni mi g-yo ba rtogs par bya ba dang / mthong bas thob par byed pa la'o ;
translated: The path of preparation is the same for all.ğŸ”½It is said that one does not upgrade faculties by the contaminated path.ğŸ”½This is because one does not upgrade to uncontaminated faculties,ğŸ”½because the uncontaminated path is not the path of preparation.

original: / zag pa dang bcas pa'i lam gyis 'pho ba med do zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba ni dbang po zag pa med pa'i 'pho ba brjod par 'dod pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: / zag pa dang bcas pa'i lam gyis 'pho ba med do zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba ni dbang po zag pa med pa'i 'pho ba brjod par 'dod pa'i phyir te /
translated: The uncontaminated path is not the path of preparation because it is the antidote to the three realms.ğŸ”½The contaminated path is not the path of preparation because it is not the antidote to the three realms.ğŸ”½The uncontaminated path is not the path of seeing because it is not the first uncontaminated path.

original: 'phags pa'i lam ni thams cad kyi nang na chung ba yang 'jig rten pa bas ches gsal ba'i phyir ro //ğŸ”½de'i phyir 'phags pa rnams kyi dbang po ni 'jig rten las 'das pa kho nas 'pho ba yin no //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam ni thams cad kyi nang na chung ba yang 'jig rten pa bas ches gsal ba'i phyir ro // de'i phyir 'phags pa rnams kyi dbang po ni 'jig rten las 'das pa kho nas 'pho ba yin no //
translated: The contaminated path is not the path of seeing because it is not the first path.

original: gzhan du ni ma yin te /
analyzed: gzhan du ni ma yin te /
translated: The uncontaminated path is not the path of meditation because it is not the second uncontaminated path.ğŸ”½The contaminated path is not the path of meditation because it is not the second path.ğŸ”½The uncontaminated path is not the uninterrupted path because it is not the antidote to the three realms.ğŸ”½The contaminated path is not the uninterrupted path because it is not the antidote to the three realms.

original: yongs su nyams pa mi srid pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: yongs su nyams pa mi srid pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba la /
translated: The uncontaminated path is not the liberated path because it is not the first uncontaminated path.ğŸ”½The contaminated path is not the liberated path because it is not the first path.ğŸ”½The uncontaminated path is not the special path because it is not the antidote to the three realms.ğŸ”½The contaminated path is not the special path because it is not the antidote to the three realms.

original: 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i rigs drug ni ma yin te /
analyzed: 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i rigs drug ni ma yin te /
translated: The six types of gods who experience desire realm objects are not.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: yul rgya che ba la skyo ba rnams la de la dmigs pa'i yongs su nyams pa mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yul rgya che ba la skyo ba rnams la de la dmigs pa'i yongs su nyams pa mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is impossible for those who are disgusted with the vast objects of the desire realm to fully degenerate from them.

original: gzhan yang dor ni dbang po rnon pos 'bras bu thob ste /
analyzed: gzhan yang dor ni dbang po rnon pos 'bras bu thob ste /
translated: Moreover, those of sharp faculty obtain their result in the desire realm.

original: de'i phyir yongs su nyams pa med do //
analyzed: de'i phyir yongs su nyams pa med do //
translated: Therefore they do not fully degenerate.

original: 'phags pa'i gzugs dang gzugs med par skyes pa dbang po 'pho ba dang yongs su nyams pa dag ni sngar bkag zin to //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i gzugs dang gzugs med par skyes pa dbang po 'pho ba dang yongs su nyams pa dag ni sngar bkag zin to //
translated: It has already been refuted that Äryas born in the form and formless realms fully degenerate or upgrade their intellectual faculty.

original: ji skad du zhe na /
analyzed: ji skad du zhe na /
translated: How is that?

original: dus gzhan gyi bar du yongs su bsgoms pas dbang po rnams ches yongs su smin pa'i phyir dang / rten khyad par can rnyed pa'i phyir ro zhes bya bar ro //
analyzed: dus gzhan gyi bar du yongs su bsgoms pas dbang po rnams ches yongs su smin pa'i phyir dang / rten khyad par can rnyed pa'i phyir ro zhes bya bar ro //
translated: Because their intellectual faculty is fully ripened through further cultivation and because they obtain a special support.

original: mi slobs dgu la brten te //
analyzed: mi slobs dgu la brten te //
translated: They are supported by nine.

original: zhes bya ba ni de'i 'bras bus dgus bsdus pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni de'i 'bras bus dgus bsdus pa'i phyir ro //
translated: They are included in the nine that are their result.

original: slob pa drug la zhes bya ba ni srid pa'i dbang du byas nas bshad de phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bus drug gis bsdus pa'o //
analyzed: slob pa drug la zhes bya ba ni srid pa'i dbang du byas nas bshad de phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bus drug gis bsdus pa'o //
translated: The six learners refers to those subsumed by the six stages of the desire realm, since it is explained from the perspective of existence.

original: 'bras bu'i lam kho na thob par 'gyur na zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa'i khams la 'dod chags dang bral ba tsam gyis bsdus pa'o //
analyzed: 'bras bu'i lam kho na thob par 'gyur na zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa'i khams la 'dod chags dang bral ba tsam gyis bsdus pa'o //
translated: If they obtain the result alone, they are subsumed by the result of nonreturn alone, since they are subsumed by mere freedom from attachment to the desire realm.

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu gzugs med pa'i sas bsdus pa ni yod pa ma yin te de na mthong ba'i lam med pa'i phyir la /
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu gzugs med pa'i sas bsdus pa ni yod pa ma yin te de na mthong ba'i lam med pa'i phyir la /
translated: The result of nonreturn subsumed by the formless realm does not exist because the path of seeing does not exist there.

original: de med pa ni 'dod pa'i khams la mi dmigs pa'i phyir yin no //
analyzed: de med pa ni 'dod pa'i khams la mi dmigs pa'i phyir yin no //
translated: And that does not exist because it does not focus on the desire realm.

original: @207a * // sangs rgyas gnyis ni mi g-yo ba'i bye brag kho na yin te zhes bya ba ni mi g-yo ba'i chos can dbang po chung ngu dang / 'bring dang / chen po'i bye brag gis gsum du dbye ste /
analyzed: @207a * // sangs rgyas gnyis ni mi g-yo ba'i bye brag kho na yin te zhes bya ba ni mi g-yo ba'i chos can dbang po chung ngu dang / 'bring dang / chen po'i bye brag gis gsum du dbye ste /
translated: The two buddhas are just different types of immutable arhats.

original: de la 'bring dang chen po ni rang sangs rgyas dang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang gnyis yin no //
analyzed: de la 'bring dang chen po ni rang sangs rgyas dang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang gnyis yin no //
translated: The medium and great faculties are the two, pratyekabuddhas and perfect buddhas.

original: chung ngu'i chung ngu la sogs pa dbang po rnam pa dgu'i bye brag gis zhes bya ba ni yongs su nyams pa'i chos can dbang po chung ngu'i chung ngu yin pas na /
analyzed: chung ngu'i chung ngu la sogs pa dbang po rnam pa dgu'i bye brag gis zhes bya ba ni yongs su nyams pa'i chos can dbang po chung ngu'i chung ngu yin pas na /
translated: The nine types of faculty, such as the weak-weak, are the nine types of faculty of the arhat.

original: bcom ldan 'das dbang po chen po'i chen po yin pa'i bar ro //ğŸ”½dang po nyid nas zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba ni dang po so so'i skye bo'i gnas skabs nyid na gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pas /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das dbang po chen po'i chen po yin pa'i bar ro // dang po nyid nas zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba ni dang po so so'i skye bo'i gnas skabs nyid na gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pas /
translated: The weak-weak faculty is the arhat who regresses, up to the strong-strong faculty is the Bhagavan.ğŸ”½From the very beginning, they are not dependent on others,

original: gzhan la dran pa nye bar gzhog pa la sogs pa'i chos thos nas phyis don rnams la sbyor ba'i phyir te /
analyzed: gzhan la dran pa nye bar gzhog pa la sogs pa'i chos thos nas phyis don rnams la sbyor ba'i phyir te /
translated: because they do not rely on others to hear the Dharma of close mindfulness and so on, and later they apply themselves to the meaning.

original: bsam pa dang bsgom pa brten pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: bsam pa dang bsgom pa brten pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: This is because they rely on contemplation and meditation.

original: so so'i skye bo'i gnas skabs nyid na chos kyi rjes su 'brang bas bdag nyid kyis byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa la sogs pa'i chos kyi rjes su 'brang zhing don rnams la sbyor ba'i phyir te /
analyzed: so so'i skye bo'i gnas skabs nyid na chos kyi rjes su 'brang bas bdag nyid kyis byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa la sogs pa'i chos kyi rjes su 'brang zhing don rnams la sbyor ba'i phyir te /
translated: In the state of ordinary beings, they are followers of reality because they follow the Dharma of the factors that contribute to enlightenment and so on by themselves and they are engaged in the meaning of the Dharma.

original: bsam pa dang bsgom pa brten pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bsam pa dang bsgom pa brten pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because they rely on thought and meditation.

original: de ltar na sbyor ba las ni dad pa dang chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba dag yin no //
analyzed: de ltar na sbyor ba las ni dad pa dang chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba dag yin no //
translated: Thus, they are followers of faith and followers of reality in terms of application.ğŸ”½In terms of predominance of faith and predominance of wisdom.

original: dad pas mos pa dang / shes rab lhag pa'i sgo nas zhes bya ba ni dad pas mos pa lhag pa dang ; shes rab lhag pa'i sgo nas so //
analyzed: dad pas mos pa dang / shes rab lhag pa'i sgo nas zhes bya ba ni dad pas mos pa lhag pa dang ; shes rab lhag pa'i sgo nas so //
translated: In terms of predominance of faith and predominance of wisdom.

original: dad pas mos pa lhag pa'i phyir dad pas mos pa ni dbang po rtul po nyid yin la /
analyzed: dad pas mos pa lhag pa'i phyir dad pas mos pa ni dbang po rtul po nyid yin la /
translated: Because of predominance of faith, those resolute in faith are of dull faculty.

original: de bzhin du shes rab lhag pa'i phyir mthong bas thob pa ni dbang po rnon po nyid yin te /
analyzed: de bzhin du shes rab lhag pa'i phyir mthong bas thob pa ni dbang po rnon po nyid yin te /
translated: Similarly, because of predominance of wisdom, those obtaining results by insight are of sharp faculty.

original: de'i dad pa ni shes rab lhag pa can yin no //
analyzed: de'i dad pa ni shes rab lhag pa can yin no //
translated: Their faith is accompanied by wisdom.

original: snyoms par 'jug pa las ni lus kyis mngon du byed pa ste zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: snyoms par 'jug pa las ni lus kyis mngon du byed pa ste zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Those who physically manifest nirvana are classified as physically manifesting nirvana through meditative attainment.

original: dbang po rtul po dang rnon po 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa thob pa dag khyad par med par mya ngan las 'das pa dang 'dra ba'i chos lus kyis mngon sum du byed pa'i phyir /
analyzed: dbang po rtul po dang rnon po 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa thob pa dag khyad par med par mya ngan las 'das pa dang 'dra ba'i chos lus kyis mngon sum du byed pa'i phyir /
translated: Those of dull and sharp intellectual faculty who obtain the meditative attainment of cessation physically manifest dharma that is similar to nirvana, since they physically manifest nirvana.

original: lus kyis mngon sum du byed pa yin pas snyoms par 'jug pa las rnam par gzhag gi dbang po dang sbyor ba las ni ma yin no //ğŸ”½rnam par grol ba las ni shes rab kyis rnam par grol ba'o zhes bya ba ni dus kyis rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i dus dang mi sbyor ba ste /ğŸ”½rnam par grol ba tsam la ltos nas shes rab kyis rnam par grol ba rnam par gzhag pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: lus kyis mngon sum du byed pa yin pas snyoms par 'jug pa las rnam par gzhag gi dbang po dang sbyor ba las ni ma yin no // rnam par grol ba las ni shes rab kyis rnam par grol ba'o zhes bya ba ni dus kyis rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i dus dang mi sbyor ba ste / rnam par grol ba tsam la ltos nas shes rab kyis rnam par grol ba rnam par gzhag pa'i phyir ro //
translated: They are classified as physically manifesting nirvana through meditative attainment, but not through intellectual faculty or preparation.ğŸ”½Those liberated by wisdom are classified as liberated by wisdom in terms of liberation.ğŸ”½They are classified as liberated by wisdom in terms of mere liberation, since they are liberated by wisdom and are not liberated in time.

original: snyoms par 'jug pa @207b dang rnam par grol ba las ni zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: snyoms par 'jug pa @207b dang rnam par grol ba las ni zhes bya ba la /
translated: Those who physically manifest nirvana and are liberated by wisdom are classified as physically manifesting nirvana and liberated by wisdom in terms of meditative attainment and liberation.

original: de ni 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa thob pa'i phyir rnam par thar pa'i sgrib pa las rnam par grol lo //
analyzed: de ni 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa thob pa'i phyir rnam par thar pa'i sgrib pa las rnam par grol lo //
translated: He is liberated from the obscurations to the liberations because he has attained the meditative attainment of cessation.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgrib pa ni rnam par thar pa'i sgrib pa ste /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgrib pa ni rnam par thar pa'i sgrib pa ste /
translated: The obscurations to the liberations are the obscurations to the liberations.

original: de yang gang gis bsam gtan dag skyed par mi nus pa lus dang sems dag las su mi rung ba nyid do ;
analyzed: de yang gang gis bsam gtan dag skyed par mi nus pa lus dang sems dag las su mi rung ba nyid do ;
translated: Moreover, they are the unserviceability of the body and mind that prevents one from generating the meditative concentrations.

original: / dgra bcom pa'i rnam par grol ba thob pas nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa'i cha las rnam par grol te de'i phyir snyoms par 'jug pa'i rnam par grol ba las gnyi ga'i cha las rnam par grol ba rnam par gzhag go //
analyzed: / dgra bcom pa'i rnam par grol ba thob pas nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa'i cha las rnam par grol te de'i phyir snyoms par 'jug pa'i rnam par grol ba las gnyi ga'i cha las rnam par grol ba rnam par gzhag go //
translated: He is liberated from the portion of the obscurations that are the mental afflictions because he has attained the liberation of an arhat. Therefore, he is established as being liberated from both portions through the liberation of meditative attainment.

original: rdzas su ni de dag rnam pa drug yin te zhes bya ba ni lus kyis mngon du byed pa ni dad pas mos pa dang / mthong bas thob pa gnyis kyi khongs su 'dus pa'i phyir dang / gnyi ga'i cha las rnam par grol ba ni dus kyis rnam par grol ba dang dus dang mi sbyor bar rnam par grol ba gnyis kyi khongs su 'dus pa'i phyir rdzas su ni drug yin no //
analyzed: rdzas su ni de dag rnam pa drug yin te zhes bya ba ni lus kyis mngon du byed pa ni dad pas mos pa dang / mthong bas thob pa gnyis kyi khongs su 'dus pa'i phyir dang / gnyi ga'i cha las rnam par grol ba ni dus kyis rnam par grol ba dang dus dang mi sbyor bar rnam par grol ba gnyis kyi khongs su 'dus pa'i phyir rdzas su ni drug yin no //
translated: The one liberated by both parts is included in the two, the one liberated according to circumstances and the one liberated not according to circumstances.ğŸ”½Among them, the one resolute in faith is threefold by means of the faculties.

original: de la dad pas rjes su 'brang ba la dbang po'i sgo nas ni gsum mo zhes bya ba ni dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba dbang po rtul po yin mod kyi /
analyzed: de la dad pas rjes su 'brang ba la dbang po'i sgo nas ni gsum mo zhes bya ba ni dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba dbang po rtul po yin mod kyi /
translated: The one resolute in faith is indeed of dull faculties.

original: slar chung ngu dang chen po'i bye brag gis dbye ste /
analyzed: slar chung ngu dang chen po'i bye brag gis dbye ste /
translated: However, he is classified by the distinction of small and great.

original: de dbang po rtul por mtshungs kyang shin tu rtul ba dang ches shin tu rtul ba'i bye brag yod pas so //
analyzed: de dbang po rtul por mtshungs kyang shin tu rtul ba dang ches shin tu rtul ba'i bye brag yod pas so //
translated: Although he is similar in having dull faculties, there is the distinction of extremely dull and extremely great dullness.

original: rigs kyi sgo nas ni lnga'o zhes bya ba ni mi g-yo ba'i chos can gyi rigs ma gtogs pa ste /
analyzed: rigs kyi sgo nas ni lnga'o zhes bya ba ni mi g-yo ba'i chos can gyi rigs ma gtogs pa ste /
translated: There are five by lineage, excluding the lineage of the immutable one.

original: chos rjes su 'brang ba'i skabs su bab pas de ma smos so //
analyzed: chos rjes su 'brang ba'i skabs su bab pas de ma smos so //
translated: The lineage of the one who progresses according to faith is not mentioned because it is not the proper time for that.

original: ji ltar zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar zhe na /
translated: How is that?

original: yongs su nyams pa'i chos can gyi rigs nas rtogs pa'i skal ba can gyi rigs zhes bya ba'i bar lnga yin no //
analyzed: yongs su nyams pa'i chos can gyi rigs nas rtogs pa'i skal ba can gyi rigs zhes bya ba'i bar lnga yin no //
translated: There are five: the lineage of the one who regresses, up to the lineage of the one who is capable of penetrating.

original: sngar bshad pa gsum po re re la rigs kyi bye brag yod de /
analyzed: sngar bshad pa gsum po re re la rigs kyi bye brag yod de /
translated: Each of the three previously explained has a different lineage.

original: de ltar na rigs dang dbang po'i sgo nas bco lnga yin no //
analyzed: de ltar na rigs dang dbang po'i sgo nas bco lnga yin no //
translated: Thus there are fifteen by lineage and faculty.

original: de bzhin du bco lnga po de dag re re zhing lam gyi sgo nas ni bco lnga bco lnga yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin du bco lnga po de dag re re zhing lam gyi sgo nas ni bco lnga bco lnga yin no //
translated: Each of those fifteen is fifteen by path.

original: shes pa bdun la gnas pa'o zhes bya ba ni lam la rjes su shes pa ni bsgom pa'i lam yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: shes pa bdun la gnas pa'o zhes bya ba ni lam la rjes su shes pa ni bsgom pa'i lam yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: They abide in seven knowledges, because subsequent knowledge of the truth of the path is the path of meditation.

original: de dag nyid lam gyi sgo nas ni re re zhing bco lnga bco lnga yin no //
analyzed: de dag nyid lam gyi sgo nas ni re re zhing bco lnga bco lnga yin no //
translated: Each of those fifteen is fifteen by path.

original: 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sgo nas re re yang bdun cu rtsa gsum yin no //
analyzed: 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sgo nas re re yang bdun cu rtsa gsum yin no //
translated: and each of these is multiplied by seven, since one is freed from attachment to the desire realm by means of the nine liberated paths of the three uninterrupted paths and the six liberated paths.

original: ji ltar zhe na /ğŸ”½'dod pa'i khams na 'ching ba mtha' dag dang ldan pa gcig dang / 'dod pa'i khams la rnam pa gcig spangs pa nas rnam pa dgu spangs pa'i bar dang / de bzhin du ci yang med pa'i skye mched kyi rnam @208a * //
analyzed: ji ltar zhe na / 'dod pa'i khams na 'ching ba mtha' dag dang ldan pa gcig dang / 'dod pa'i khams la rnam pa gcig spangs pa nas rnam pa dgu spangs pa'i bar dang / de bzhin du ci yang med pa'i skye mched kyi rnam @208a * //
translated: How is this so?ğŸ”½In the desire realm, there is one who possesses all the fetters and one who has abandoned one type of affliction up to one who has abandoned nine types of affliction.

original: pa gcig spangs pa nas rnam pa dgu spangs pa'i bar te /
analyzed: pa gcig spangs pa nas rnam pa dgu spangs pa'i bar te /
translated: Similarly, there is one who has abandoned one type of affliction of the base of nothingness up to one who has abandoned nine types of affliction.

original: de dag ni 'dod pa'i khams dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / gzugs med pa gsum na dgu tshan brgyad la bdun cu rtsa gnyis yin la /
analyzed: de dag ni 'dod pa'i khams dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / gzugs med pa gsum na dgu tshan brgyad la bdun cu rtsa gnyis yin la /
translated: These are the twelve sets of nine in the desire realm, the four absorptions and the three formless realm states.

original: 'dod pa'i khams kyi 'ching ba mtha' dag dang ldan pas bsnan na bdun cu rtsa gsum yin no //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i khams kyi 'ching ba mtha' dag dang ldan pas bsnan na bdun cu rtsa gsum yin no //
translated: When one who possesses all the fetters of the desire realm is added, there are seventy three.

original: srid pa'i rtse mo las 'dod chags dang bral ba ni 'dir mi brtsi ste /
analyzed: srid pa'i rtse mo las 'dod chags dang bral ba ni 'dir mi brtsi ste /
translated: Those freed from attachment to the summit of existence are not counted here.

original: mthong ba'i lam gyi snga rol du 'jig rten pa'i lam gyis srid pa'i rtse mo las 'dod chags dang bral ba med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mthong ba'i lam gyi snga rol du 'jig rten pa'i lam gyis srid pa'i rtse mo las 'dod chags dang bral ba med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because there is no one who is free from attachment to the summit of existence by the mundane path prior to the path of seeing.

original: yang na phyogs gcig la 'dod chags dang bral ba yin no //
analyzed: yang na phyogs gcig la 'dod chags dang bral ba yin no //
translated: Or else, he is free from attachment to one part.

original: rten gyi sgo nas ni dgu ste zhes bya ba ni re re zhing ste /
analyzed: rten gyi sgo nas ni dgu ste zhes bya ba ni re re zhing ste /
translated: From the point of view of basis, there are nine, each of which is a basis.

original: rten ni skye ba dang 'chi ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rten ni skye ba dang 'chi ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Basis means birth and death.

original: ji ltar zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar zhe na /
translated: How is that?

original: gling gsum dang zhes bya ba ni byang gi sgra mi snyan ma gtogs pa ste /
analyzed: gling gsum dang zhes bya ba ni byang gi sgra mi snyan ma gtogs pa ste /
translated: In three continents, except for Uttarakuru,

original: de na lam med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de na lam med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because there is no path there.

original: lha'i ris drug tu skyes pa'o zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i ris drug tu skyes pa ste ;
analyzed: lha'i ris drug tu skyes pa'o zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i ris drug tu skyes pa ste ;
translated: In six divine realms, means in the six divine realms of the desire realm.

original: de'i gong na mthong ba'i lam med pa'i phyir dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba med do //
analyzed: de'i gong na mthong ba'i lam med pa'i phyir dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba med do //
